Game information:  


Assassin's CreedÃ‚Â® Unity - Action adventure that takes you to Paris during
the French Revolution. You will learn the history of the Arno - boys, by
chance became embroiled in the bloody events of the period. You are waiting
for new opportunities in the management of this character. Change and the
appearance of objects and their characteristics. You will be able to play
Assassin's CreedÃ‚Â® Unity with friends, and some tasks to perform even three.
Witness the legendary historical events!


Game Features:  


The huge open world, incredible level of freedom, complete control of the
character movements and new mechanics of parkour.

Large assortment of weapons and clothes, equipment and specialized skills.

Create unique combinations and fully develop your character using the new
skill tree.

Updated combat mechanics, improved stealth action and special methods of
crowd control.

Paris, one of the most beautiful cities in the world, with the maximum
reliability is embodied on the game engine of the new generation.

Explore houses, castles and secret catacombs, to execute contracts, participate
in a treasure hunt and murder investigations.

Take a unique single-player campaign or invite three friends together to go on a
trip to Paris XVIII century in the mode of playing together.


RePack Features:  

Assassin's Creed: Unity
Game Version - v1.1.0
Do not cut / recoded
Ability to select a combination of text and voice
